name: TaxiTaxi - real streets in real cities that YOU control...
blurb: Build your taxi empire with TaxiTaxi, based on real streets in real cities. Draw the best routes, avoid the snarl ups and accidents.

rewards.reward: Thanks - A massive thank-you for supporting us and you will be given a backer credit on both the product website and within the game for your awesomeness!

Early Backer - You will receive a digital copy of the game (San Francisco map) upon launch on all platforms along with our eternal thanks and a backer credit on both the product website and within the game. In addition, you will get access to our backer forums to give us your thoughts and ideas.

Backer - You will receive a digital copy of the game upon launch on all platforms along with our eternal thanks and a backer credit on both the product website and within the game. In addition, you will get access to our backer forums to give us your thoughts and ideas.

Android Beta - In addition to all the previous rewards, you will get access to our Beta's via Testflight where we would love to get your feedback on progress, ideas and features. (NOTE: Beta access on this reward is only for Android users due to Apple guidelines unfortunately)

Future Proof - All the stuff above (Android Beta access only), along with London and New York maps that we have planned post initial launch - plus any others that we do! Basically, everything we do within the product going forwards.

You the Passenger - Have your name in lights!! In addition to everything above (Android Beta access only), you get the opportunity to have your name as a passenger within the game. The only proviso we have is that it is your real name and isn't rude or offensive :)

Be the Driver - Everything above (Android Beta access only) with the exception of being a passenger in the game as your name will be for a taxi driver and it would be confusing and affect the laws of physics if you were to be able to pickup yourself! Same rules as the passenger name - it has to be your real name and not be rude or offensive :)

Mr (or Mrs!) Pumpkin - All the above (Android Beta access only) with your choice of your name as passenger or taxi driver, along with an amazingly orange Binary Pumpkin polo shirt. These are so orange, at a recent trade show we had people coming to our stand asking for Mr Pumpkin. \r\n\r\nNote that whilst we can cater for most sizes, some larger sizes may not be available. (I tend to take the largest size possible and I have one that actually fits though!)

First Design Steps - All the above (Android Beta access only) with your choice of your name as passenger or taxi driver, plus you get the opportunity to create one of the drop off or pick-up points within the game city along with the associated Design credit within the game

The obligatory 'Meet the Team' reward. You get the lot to be honest including all the other rewards but you also get the opportunity to come to Dundee for a few days and both meet the team and contribute your thoughts and ideas. We will cover 2 nights accommodation and ensure you are fed but we can't provide transport.\r\n\r\nYou must be over 18 years of age and we are more than happy to entertain you in the evening in some of Scotlands more interesting establishments!

JOIN THE TEAM! With this reward you get all the other rewards plus you can come here to enjoy a Scottish winter with us and help us develop the game if you wish. We will cover 7 days accommodation and meals for you and if you are in the UK we will also cover your train fare to get here (overseas folks will have make their own way I'm afraid). If you don't want to visit us (sob), you will be involved in our design decisions and will have full access to the team remotely. Dates to be mutually agreed.
